General.Name: Taiwan Fire & Marine Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Fire & Marine Insurance Co., Ltd. provides various insurance products and services in Taiwan. It offers various lines of insurance products, including fire, marine cargo and hull, fishing vessel, aviation, automobile, money, bond and credit, liability, engineering, personal accident, health, comprehensive travel, commutable disease compensation, and travel accident insurance, as well as reinsurance products; and comprehensive fine art, burglary, glass, and other insurance products. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
